query:
SELECT 
  l.nome as loja_nome,
  rm.mes,
  rm.ano,
  rm.totalServicos,
  rm.qtdReparacoes,
  rm.qtdParaBrisas,
  rm.taxaReparacao,
  (rm.qtdReparacoes / rm.totalServicos) as taxa_calc_servicos,
  (rm.qtdReparacoes / rm.qtdParaBrisas) as taxa_calc_parabrisas
FROM resultados_mensais rm
JOIN lojas l ON rm.lojaId = l.id
WHERE l.nome LIKE '%Braga%'
  AND rm.mes = 1
  AND rm.ano = 2026;

  (rm.qtdReparacoes / rm.totalServicos) as taxa_calc_servicos,
  (rm.qtdReparacoes / rm.qtdParaBrisas) as taxa_calc_parabrisas
FROM resultados_mensais rm
JOIN lojas l ON rm.lojaId = l.id
WHERE l.nome LIKE '%Braga%'
  AND rm.mes = 1
  AND rm.ano = 2026;
